Html: I am looking forward to using this new version, but I am not seeing a SQL Query Check like was in the previous version. Has that been removed?

Hi, ah yes, good spot!

It is there but I haven't fixed it up to v3 yet - it is missing some "Configuration Discovery" metadata to allow it to appear in the Configuration UI - will add to the list of bugs to fix in the next version.

Cheers,
James
